schema.description: 修改之后的目标备注内容。
保证请求幂等性。从您的客户端生成一个参数值，确保不同请求间该参数值唯一。只支持ASCII字符，且不能超过64个字符。

RequestId.description: 阿里云为该请求生成的唯一标识符。

400.errorMessage: 50  characters long.  It can only contain numbers,Chinese,English and  special characters: _ - , . ，。

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "ZoneId": "AgIDE1MA_1**", "RequestId": "C6F1D541-E7A6-447A-A2B5-9F7A20B2A8FB" }","errorExample":"{ "Message": "The request processing has failed due to some unknown error, exception or failure", "RequestId": "E246E023-F2EB-4034-83F7-B13FCF31459C", "Code": "InternalError" }"},{"type":"xml","example":" D1324D48-1E23-4AEF-9EDE-466120561C6F AgIDE0OQ_149 ","errorExample":" F0B47FE6-C774-4833-9028-B073588A8FAA InternalError The request processing has failed due to some unknown error, exception or failure "}]
title: 修改zone的备注信息
